SELECT IPCSS_MNG_NO , SMLFACT_NM , SMLFACT_ADDR , SCALE , TOTFRAR , EXMN_DIV_NM , EXMN_YMD , EXMN_DOC_NM FROM TRF_IPCSS_NBOPL WHERE IPCSS_MNG_NO = #{ipcssMngNo}
AND USG_CD IN ('001','101','103','106','109','111','112')
AND USG_CD NOT IN ('001','101','103','106','109','111','112')
GROUP BY IPCSS_MNG_NO, SMLFACT_NM, SMLFACT_ADDR, SCALE, TOTFRAR, EXMN_DIV_NM, EXMN_YMD, EXMN_DOC_NM, NBOPL_NO ORDER BY NBOPL_NO::NUMERIC

SELECT moc.CD_NM , tin.USG_NO , tin.TRF_USE_CD , tin.TRF_MEAN_VHCCLS , tin.NBOPL_CNT FROM TRF_IPCSS_NBOPL tin INNER JOIN M_OP_CODE moc ON tin.USG_CD = moc.CD_ID AND moc.GRP_CD_ID = 'USG_CD' WHERE tin.SMLFACT_NM = #{smlfactNm} AND tin.SMLFACT_ADDR = #{smlfactAddr} AND tin.IPCSS_MNG_NO = #{ipcssMngNo} AND tin.TRF_USE_CD in ('1','2','3','4') AND tin.TRF_MEAN_VHCCLS in ('1','2') GROUP BY moc.CD_NM, tin.TRF_USE_CD, tin.TRF_MEAN_VHCCLS, tin.NBOPL_CNT,NBOPL_NO,usg_no ORDER BY USG_NO::NUMERIC

SELECT moc.CD_NM , tin.USG_NO , tin.TRF_USE_CD , tin.TRF_MEAN_VHCCLS , tin.NBOPL_CNT FROM TRF_IPCSS_NBOPL tin INNER JOIN M_OP_CODE moc ON tin.USG_CD = moc.CD_ID AND moc.GRP_CD_ID = 'USG_CD' WHERE tin.SMLFACT_NM = #{smlfactNm} AND tin.SMLFACT_ADDR = #{smlfactAddr} and tin.IPCSS_MNG_NO = #{ipcssMngNo} AND tin.TRF_USE_CD IN ('5','6') AND tin.TRF_MEAN_VHCCLS in ('1','2') GROUP BY moc.CD_NM, tin.TRF_USE_CD, tin.TRF_MEAN_VHCCLS, tin.NBOPL_CNT, tin.USG_NO ORDER BY USG_NO::NUMERIC

WITH NBOPL_DATA_LIST AS( SELECT tin.TRF_MEAN_VHCCLS , SUM(tin.NBOPL_CNT) as NBOPL_CNT FROM TRF_IPCSS_NBOPL tin WHERE tin.IPCSS_MNG_NO = #{ipcssMngNo} AND tin.TRF_USE_CD = #{trfUseCd} GROUP BY tin.TRF_MEAN_VHCCLS ORDER BY tin.TRF_MEAN_VHCCLS ) SELECT ARRAY_TO_STRING(ARRAY_AGG(NBOPL_CNT ORDER BY TRF_MEAN_VHCCLS), ',') as nboplCntArr FROM NBOPL_DATA_LIST
